programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. Conservative icon (and 1988 presidential candidate) Pat Robertson founded the hugely popular program from a 1963 fund-raising pledge effort on UHF TV in Virginia. (cc)(

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Real-life officers are followed by a camera crew, cinéma-vérité style, in a gritty up-close look at police work and the consequences of crime. The result: one of Fox's longest-running series (it premiered in March 1989). It also spawned a number of police-reality imitators. Initially filmed only in Broward County, Fla., the series went on to show officers in locations across the country. (repeat)(n).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf: Hyundai Tournament of Champions
programme.desc: Final-round play in the Hyundai Tournament of Champions at the Plantation Course at Kapalua on Maui, Hawaii. Last year, Patrick Reed came from four strokes back with four holes to play, then defeated Jimmy Walker on the first hole of a playoff. (cc)(n).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf: Sony Open
programme.desc: Sony Open final-round play in Honolulu. (cc)(n).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf: CareerBuilder Challenge
programme.desc: Final-round play in the $5.8 million CareerBuilder Challenge at PGA West TPC in La Quinta. Bill Haas won this event last year by one shot over five other players when it was known as the Humana Challenge. (cc)(n).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf: Farmers Insurance Open
programme.desc: Final-round play in the Farmers Insurance Open at Torrey Pines in La Jolla, Cal. (cc)(n).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf: Phoenix Open
programme.desc: Final-round play in the $6.5 million Phoenix Open at TPC Scottsdale. Brooks Koepka got his first PGA victory here last season, outlasting three players to win by a single shot. His final round included an eagle on the 15th hole. (cc)(n).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf: Pebble Beach National Pro-Am
programme.desc: Final-round play in the Pebble Beach National Pro-Am. Brandt Snedeker broke his own tournament scoring record here last year, winning this tournament for the second time in three years. He bogeyed only one hole over the course of four rounds. (cc)(n).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf: Northern Trust Open
programme.desc: Final-round play in the Northern Trust Open at the Riviera Country Club in Pacific Palisades, Cal. Bubba Watson shot a 64 in the final round to beat Dustin Johnson by two shots here last year, getting his first victory since the 2012 Masters. (cc)(n).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf: Honda Classic
programme.desc: Final-round play in the Honda Classic in Palm Beach Gardens, Fla. Padraig Harrington got his first Tour win since 2008 here last year, defeating Daniel Berger on the second hole of a playoff. Harrington was behind by four shots with nine holes to play. (cc)(n).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf: WGC-Cadillac Championship
programme.desc: Final-round play in the $9.5 million WGC-Cadillac Championship at Trump National Doral in Miami. In last year's tourney, Dustin Johnson came from five strokes back in the final round to beat J.B. Holmes by a single shot. (cc)(n).

programme.title: NFL Primetime
programme.desc: Highlights and in-depth analysis of National Football League action. programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia. (live) (cc)(n).

The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia. (live) (cc)(n).

programme.title: Stander

programme.title: Hot Rod

Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel(n).

programme.title: Unknown Caller

Stars Frances McDormand, William H. Macy and Steve Buscemi(n).

Winner of the 2016 Sundance Grand Jury Prize for U.S. Documentary(n).
